flavorText: It lurks in the spaces between moments.

foreignData.name: Gezeitenbarrakuda
foreignData.text:
Jeder Spieler kann Zaubersprüche wirken, als ob sie Aufblitzen hätten.
Deine Gegner können während deines Zuges keine Zaubersprüche wirken.

foreignData.flavorText: Merodea por los huecos entre momentos.
foreignData.name: Barracuda de la marea
foreignData.text:
Cualquier jugador puede lanzar hechizos como si tuvieran la habilidad de destello.
Tus oponentes no pueden lanzar hechizos durante tu turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il rôde dans les intervalles entre les instants.
foreignData.name: Barracuda des marées
foreignData.text:
N'importe quel joueur peut lancer des sorts comme s'ils avaient le flash.
Vos adversaires ne peuvent pas lancer de sorts pendant votre tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Resta in agguato negli spazi tra un momento e l'altro.
foreignData.name: Barracuda delle Maree
foreignData.text:
Qualsiasi giocatore può lanciare magie come se avessero lampo.
I tuoi avversari non possono lanciare magie durante il tuo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: それは時の狭間に潜んでいる。
foreignData.name: 高潮のバラクーダ
foreignData.text:
どのプレイヤーも、呪文を、それが瞬速を持っているかのように唱えてもよい。
あなたのターンの間、対戦相手は呪文を唱えられない。

foreignData.flavorText: Ela espreita nos espaços entre um momento e outro.
foreignData.name: Barracuda das Marés
foreignData.text:
Qualquer jogador pode conjurar mágicas como se elas tivessem lampejo.
Seus oponentes não podem conjurar mágicas durante seu turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Она охотится в пространстве между мгновениями.
foreignData.name: Приливная Барракуда
foreignData.text:
Любой игрок может разыгрывать заклинания, как будто у них есть Миг.
Ваши оппоненты не могут разыгрывать заклинания во время вашего хода.

name: Tidal Barracuda
originalText:
Any player may cast spells as though they had flash.
Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.

rulings.text: Tidal Barracuda’s abilities apply only while Tidal Barracuda is on the battlefield. Notably, its first ability doesn’t apply to Tidal Barracuda as you’re casting it.
Tidal Barracuda’s first ability doesn’t grant flash to any objects. It just changes when spells can be cast.

Once a player announces that they’re casting a spell, players can’t try to remove Tidal Barracuda to make it so that spell couldn’t be cast at that time. Spells cast as though they had flash will still resolve if able, even if Tidal Barracuda is no longer on the battlefield at that time.
Your opponents can still activate abilities during your turn.
If an effect says that an opponent may cast a spell during your turn, Tidal Barracuda’s restriction overrules that permission.

text:
Any player may cast spells as though they had flash.
Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.
